document.full_text: a suicide bomber killed the police chief of afghanistan's southern kandahar province on friday after penetrating tight defenses at the police headquarters, a spokesman for the provincial governor said.
document.title: suicide bomber kills kandahar police chief: afghan official
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber killed the police chief of afghanistan's southern kandahar province on friday after penetrating tight defenses at the police headquarters, a spokesman for the provincial governor said.
